# THE MIND; collaboration game 
## Can community groups succeed in non-verbal coordination tasks better than isolated(non-community) groups? 


# Goal of the experiment 
The **goal**  Community groups do overall better in a non-verbal coordination task. In a community group, people will be more cooperative and adjust their behavior than in isolated groups


## variables

* time to success per round
* overall time to success
* overall success rate
* success rate per round
